about_the_game:
Overview


You've woken up one day and decided to clean up your room. However, it's not just your room that's messy—it's your whole house! Utilize your environment and your reflexes to the fullest in this virtual reality puzzle game all about putting objects in their proper places. You don't have all day to clean up the place, so do your best to form the most efficient and quickest way to pick up everything and pack it up!

Gameplay


The main game mechanics are simple. Just grab the objects that have a highlight on them, and then put them where they belong! Toys go in the toy chest, and books go in the book bin. Can't grab an object that's just out of reach? No worries! This game allows you to teleport to a given area inside the room you're currently in using your VR controller's joysticks. Accidentally dropped an object out of bounds? Just reset the level! You can also check the time left and the bins you filled with the press of a button on your controller too.

Game Modes


Pickup 'N' Packup includes one game mode as of now (Normal Mode), but two more (Time Trial and Zen) will be added soon.

Normal Mode: The default game mode for Pickup 'N' Packup! You have a set amount of time to place every object into their respective bins. If you do that within the time limit, you win. Simple! There isn't a life system, so if you mess up on a level because you ran out of time, don't worry. Just try again!

name: Pickup 'N' Packup!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Meta Quest 2
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3

short_description: Pickup 'N' Packup! is a virtual reality puzzle game about putting objects around your house in their proper places. You don't have all day to clean up the place, so do your best to form the most efficient and quickest way to pick up everything and pack it up!
